name: Orchestral Adventure
description:
The goal of the game is to build instruments, to help you fight the corrupted notes. You'll need to traverse a randomly generated map, with 5 bossfights to defeat them all. You'll find shops and treasure on your way, which will help you in your journey.

Controls:
  • Enter - Start Wave, Select, Interact
  • E - Use Ability
  • M - Mute Instrument Sounds
  • TAB - Inventory
  • Arrows - Move Selection
  • Click and drag templates from the templates tab to place them down
  • Click and drag instrument parts onto templates to build the instrument
Quick Guide

The most effective strategy (that I found) is to get a second instrument right after the first shop. (usually a Xylophone or a Flute, since they are the easiest and cheapest to build). From here, you want to focus on getting as many instruments as you can.

Instruments Guide Flute: 

The flute ability (that you have by default), knocks enemies back for around 10 seconds. The flute is the easiest instrument to build, requiring only a single part.

Xylophone: 

It's ability triples attack speed of every Xylophone. Slightly stronger than the flute.

Violin: 

When it's ability is used, it summons a Cello for 10 seconds. The cello shoots 10 shots, each dealing 10 damage, which is the highest damage possible without upgrades.

Acoustic Guitar: 

It's ability damages every enemy on screen by 10 damage. A pretty strong instrument by itself.

Electric Guitar:

It's ability increases attack speed by 100% on all of your instruments for 10 seconds. It attacks really fast, and has the best DPS out of all instruments.
